name: test_e2e_with_logs[SQLI_TIME_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_003` |
| **Name** | SQL Server WAITFOR DELAY |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'`
- **Encoded**: `WAITFOR%20DELAY%20%270%3A0%3A5%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_SQLI_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | Time-based Blind SQL Injection |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_003-1765102842148-c0ac4 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_003 uri=/?q=WAITFOR%20DELAY%20%270%3A0%3A5%27 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET |
| **Match Status** | `MATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 10:20:42.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_003-1765102842148-c0ac4 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_003 uri=/?q=WAITFOR%20DELAY%20%270%3A0%3A5%27 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
10:20:42.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_003-1765102842148-c0ac4 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_003 uri=/?q=WAITFOR%20DELAY%20%270%3A0%3A5%27 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
